home.about.aboutFirstLine: "Lony", pronounced "Luni", is the result of a dream shared by Estefany, Isabela, Ester, Larissa and Bianka. We are a group of girls with a passion for fashion, united by a daring purpose: to create our own brand and conquer the heart of Brazil.
home.about.aboutSecondLine: With an international outlook, we aim to take our unique and innovative style beyond borders, with the ultimate goal of shining on global stages, perhaps even on the bustling streets of New York. Together, we are determined to make our mark on the fashion world, and the journey to success is just the beginning of our exciting story.
home.corePrinciples.missionText.part1: Our purpose is to encourage young fashion beginners by offering an inspiring and authentic journey. Through carefully crafted pieces, we aim not only to follow trends, but also to promote self-expression and personal confidence.
home.corePrinciples.missionText.part2: is to create a positive impact by empowering every girl to embrace her identity and shine with confidence. This commitment is the main pillar of our work, reflecting our genuine desire to make a difference in the lives of others.
home.corePrinciples.visionText.part1: We envision a world where every girl, regardless of her background or origin, feels empowered to express her true essence through fashion.
home.corePrinciples.visionText.part2: is to be recognised as a beacon of inspiration, promoting a culture of trust, authenticity and inclusion throughout the fashion industry.
home.testimonials.matheusText: Lony is one of the most sensational projects I know of. I'm not the best fashion expert, but I see a promising future in their work, which is made up of a lot of effort and creativity, which are already important differentials for the consolidation of their dreams. I fully recommend the brand to anyone.
